summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: format
param.para: A -typed value that specifies the texture format.

param.name: width
param.para: Texture width (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (16384). For a texture cube-map, the range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURECUBE_DIMENSION (16384). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: height
param.para: Texture height (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (16384). For a texture cube-map, the range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURECUBE_DIMENSION (16384). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of textures in the texture array. The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE2D_ARRAY_AXIS_DIMENSION (2048). For a texture cube-map, this value is a multiple of 6 (that is, 6 times the value in the NumCubes member of ), and the range is from 6 to 2046. The range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

param.name: mipLevels
param.para: The maximum number of mipmap levels in the texture. See the remarks in . Use 1 for a multisampled texture; or 0 to generate a full set of subtextures.

param.name: bindFlags
param.para: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how to bind the texture to pipeline stages.

param.name: usage
param.para: A -typed value that identifies how the texture is to be read from and written to.

param.name: cpuaccessFlags
param.para: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies the types of CPU access allowed.

param.name: miscFlags
param.para: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies other, less common resource options. For a texture cube-map, set the flag. Cube-map arrays (that is, arraySize > 6) require feature level or higher.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure.
